Details: Created clear policy for returns and refunds. Included time limits, acceptable reasons, and required condition.
Building workflow for handling return requests. Includes RMA numbers and inspection steps.
Train staff on managing returns and disputes. Provide scripts and FAQ.
Track and analyze reasons for returns. Look for patterns or recurring issues.
Establish process for resolving buyer-seller disputes. Use escalation path if needed.
Record outcomes of returns and disputes for future reference.
